label: Null pointer dereference
solution: Ensure the pointer is initialized before use. Add nil checks and consider using constructor functions.

label: Race condition in goroutine
solution: Protect shared state with mutexes or channels. Run `go test -race` to detect race conditions.

label: Deadlock in mutex
solution: Avoid nested locks and ensure mutexes are always unlocked, preferably using `defer`.

label: Channel closed twice
solution: Only close channels from the sender side and ensure closure happens exactly once.

label: Index out of range panic
solution: Validate slice indices before access and guard loops with correct bounds.
